summary: Adds standalone female Dunmer follower with custom spell
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]ï»¿[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/16913/]Version for Skyrim Special Edition is HERE[/url][/size][/center]

[img]http://jpegshare.net/images/fb/a6/fba6005280a7ec64ee35739388eb776d.png[/img]
[color=#d8d8d8][font=Kalinga]This is a new version of my very first mod. Rawia is a Dunmer witch focused on Conjuration magic to raise the dead, also she uses healing spells, protecting Alteration spells and some Destruction spells from Dragonborn DLC. She has three albino spiders as pets and can conjure them in battle. Don't worry, if in her first battle she will conjure only one, soon she will conjure more. There is a total of three pets and there may be different combinations when conjuring. Rawia has all perks for her schools of magic and for Stealth (for not activating traps). She doesn't have perks for armors or weapons, so keep it in mind if you would like to change her equipment. You may hire Rawia for free in New Gnisis Cornerclub, Windhelm. She is essential and marriageable.

Special features:
- Fully standalone follower (outfit, textures, meshes)
- High-poly head
- Custom spell[/font]

[img]http://jpegshare.net/images/b4/d6/b4d6b7a3ec149e3093d706a9605f81b3.png[/img]
[color=#d8d8d8][font=Kalinga]This mod requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCs. Place mod's files to your Data folder with rewrite, activate TMRawia.esp in the launcher. If you want to install optional warpaint, install it after main file with rewrite.
For EEO users: Rawia's face will not change due to EEO, she has her own head model and will stay as is. There will be no EEO compatible version.[/font][/color]


[color=#dd7e6b][b][font=Kalinga]IMPORTANT![/font][/b][/color]
[color=#d8d8d8][font=Kalinga]For users who have been using an old version of Rawia - you need to delete it before installing this version. The mod was remade from scratch because of no possibility to remove its dependancy to ApachiiSkyHair. Rawia's face was saved and copied, so you will not loose anything in this new version.

Dismiss old Rawia in game, save, then delete old files by following paths:
[i]Skyrim/Data/Rawia.esp
Skyrim/Data/Meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/Rawia.esp
Skyrim/Data/Meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint/Rawia.esp[/i]

Then install new version and enjoy new features :)[/font][/color]

[img]http://jpegshare.net/images/67/0d/670d5d39055c548948cf58e0e8d1b765.png[/img]
[color=#d8d8d8][font=Kalinga]dimon99 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
Erik for [url=http://anvilbay.ru/files/skyrim-highpoly-heads/]Skyrim HighPoly Heads[/url]
Halofarm for [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/high-poly-feet-and-hands-for-unp-bodies/]High Poly Feet and Hands for UNP Bodies[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1702435]kani_hime[/url] for face & body textures
Xenius for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/498/]Eyes[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21082/]brows[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977/]warpaint[/url]
Diethardt for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31332/]Weathered and Worn Warpaints[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/]makeup[/url]
ElaNeith for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54118/]The Neith Team Warpaints Set[/url]
TheDNightshade for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57198/]Equipable Horns[/url]
Zairaam and Natterforme for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20077/]Tribunal robes[/url]
Apachii for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]ApachiiSkyHair[/url][/font][/color]

[right][b][i][color=#d8d8d8][font=Kalinga]Permission note:
you are not allowed to modify, translate or reupload this mod without permissions.[/font][/color][/i][/b][/right][/color]
